reviews.review: Wow, what a movie from start to finish

While knowing I’m not a hardcore avengers fan, I have enjoyed the comics and the movies for years. I am a longtime Guardians of the Galaxy fan, too. However, I left this movie with a “ why did I bother to spend the money ?” kind of feeling. I suppose if just one or even two of the cast didn’t make it through and ended up dying it would be a surprise but there would still be more of a purpose for this movie than just special effects and a whole lot of fighting and killing. The acting for the most part was very good.....but the purpose for this movie totally escapes me. Won’t be seeing any sequels especially if they somehow resurrect the characters to make more money off fans.
I really like this movie. But they had to destroy Wakanda

Unlike the Lucasfilm branch of Disney, which insults fans both cinematicly and in response to critism, the Marvel branch thrives on delivering good stories, interesting characters, and staying as true as they can to the fan base. Having digested this movie for a day now, I can honestly say I'm ready to see it again. From the outset, I knew I wasn't getting a run of the mill Marvel movie. Thanos was really flushed out well. His motivations were able to be understood. He was human enough to be relatable. What I loved the most was the bad guy won. Heroes died. The bold direction taken with charcters some loved, some didn't, and some were like meh about was as well done as one could when involving so many characters at once. I applaud Marvel for subverting us well, with respect to the characters and fans, unlike some directors I won't mention. Ruin Johnson.

Great movie. The interaction among the newly introduced characters is funny to see. The ending though... hmm. Not impressed. Did not feel the passing of time, not a dull moment so to speak. Overall I enjoyed the experience. Look forward to future movies!

Best super hero movie of all time. In fact, it's one of the best movies of all time. Juggling so many characters so effectively has never been done before. Excellent from beginning to end. Excellent use of humor, without overdoing it. Can't wait to see where the series go from here.
Horrible movie won't see the sequel waste of my money
Fantastic movie. Never a dull moment and superb acting.

I am so over Marvel films but given the lack of anything half decent at the moment I gave it a go. 

I love the ending - this would be an awesome end to all these films but sadly we know they are coming back with some time change strategy
